Class ChatInviteLink

java.lang.Object
io.github.natanimn.telebof.types.chat_and_user.ChatInviteLink
public class ChatInviteLink extends Object
Represents an invite link for a chat.
Since:
3 March 2025
Version:
0.9
Author:
Natanim

  • Field Details

    • invite_link

      public String invite_link
      The invite link. If the link was created by another chat administrator, then the second part of the link will be replaced with “…”.

    • name

      public String name
      Optional. Invite link name

    • creator

      public User creator
      Creator of the link

    • expire_date

      public Integer expire_date
      Optional. Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the link will expire or has been expired

    • member_limit

      public Integer member_limit
      Optional. The maximum number of users that can be members of the chat simultaneously after joining the chat via this invite link; 1-99999

    • pending_join_request_count

      public Integer pending_join_request_count
      Optional. Number of pending join requests created using this link

    • subscription_period

      public Integer subscription_period
      Optional. The number of seconds the subscription will be active for before the next payment

    • subscription_price

      public Integer subscription_price
      Optional. The amount of Telegram Stars a user must pay initially and after each subsequent subscription period to be a member of the chat using the link

    • is_primary

      public Boolean is_primary
      True, if the link is primary

    • is_revoked

      public Boolean is_revoked
      True, if the link is revoked

    • creates_join_request

      public Boolean creates_join_request
      True, if users joining the chat via the link need to be approved by chat administrators

  • Constructor Details

    • ChatInviteLink

      public ChatInviteLink()
